DOC.brief_summary: This is an evaluation of adenosine methionine for treatment of chronic hepatitis b patients with cholestasis efficacy and safety of multicenter, randomized, open label clinical trial.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of S-adenosyl-L-methionine in Treatment of Chronic Hepatitis B Patients With Cholestasis
DOC.detailed_description: evaluation of adenosine methionine for treatment of chronic hepatitis b patients with cholestasis efficacy and safety
DOC.criteria: 1. from 1865 years old 2. diagnosed as hepatitis B, previous has HBV or HBsAg(+)>6 months, and now HBsAg or HBV DNA(+) 3. with intrahepatic cholestasis: meet EASL 2009 diagnoses criteria ALP>1.5ULN and GGT>3ULN or STB>2ULN 1. liver mass, liver carcinoma 2. liver failure 3. nonhepatic diseases caused jaundice 4. obstructive jaundice
